about_the_game:
Welcome to the purr-fectly adorable world of "Neko Times: Purrfect Shapes"—a puzzle game as cute as it is clever!

Unwind and have fun as you organize charming, quirky cats into grids, each one with its own unique shape and personality. Whether you're looking to relax after a long day or challenge yourself with tricky puzzles, this game has something for everyone.

Drag, drop, and match these delightful felines into the right spots, and watch as they come to life with adorable animations. As the levels progress, so does the challenge—but don’t worry, you’ll be soothed by the calming soundtrack and endearing hand-drawn visuals. Neko Times is all about enjoying a fun, feel-good experience that you can pick up anytime.

Key Features:
Quirky Cat Puzzles: Arrange a variety of 30 cute, uniquely shaped cats into grids and see them come alive.
80 Purrfect Levels: Dive into 8 chapters of puzzles, each more challenging than the last.
Heartwarming Art: Hand-drawn illustrations and playful animations bring each cat and puzzle to life.
Relaxing Soundtrack: Chill out with calming music that sets the perfect mood for a casual puzzle session.
Fun for Everyone: Whether you’re new to puzzles or a seasoned pro, the easy-to-learn mechanics offer plenty of depth to keep you engaged.
Perfect for casual gaming sessions, Neko Times: Purrfect Shapes is the ideal blend of cute and clever—your new go-to puzzle game!

name: Neko Times: Purrfect Shapes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz (or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard with at least 512MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard with at least 1GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Neko Times: Purrfect Shapes" is a relaxing, feel-good puzzle game where you organize cute, quirky cats into grids. With 80 delightful levels, charming visuals, and soothing gameplay, it's the perfect way to unwind while having fun!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
